price: Bagi mereka di dalam surga itu apa yang mereka kehendaki, sedang mereka kekal (di dalamnya). (Hal itu) adalah janji dari Tuhan-mu yang patut dimohonkan (kepada-Nya).
arabic: لَّهُمۡ فِيهَا مَا يَشَآءُونَ خَٰلِدِينَۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعۡدٗا مَّسۡـُٔولٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā mā yashāūna khālidīna kāna ʿalā rabbika waʿdan masūlan
